Comment: The answer provided gives a solid explanation of the significance of the Day of Pentecost in the New Testament. It correctly highlights the key points such as the outpouring of the Holy Spirit, the empowerment of the early Christians, the fulfillment of prophecy, and the beginning of the church age. It effectively connects the event to the Great Commission and emphasizes the role of the Holy Spirit in the life of believers. Well done!
